name: Magic Actions - Dark (New Youtube Design)
description:
Magic Actions Options for YouTube - Dark (New Youtube Design) -
Includes the New Youtube design and the Old Youtube design
After use this css:http://imgur.com/njnkVUb http://imgur.com/a/p5azQ
*You can change the parameter "Filter" to your liking
